B

Bishop - Class in model.character
Class corresponding to a Bishop inherited from the Character class
Bishop(int, String, Coordinates, Army, int, int, Board) - Constructor for class model.character.Bishop
board - Variable in class model.Army
The board where the army is on
Board - Class in model.board
An abstract class to factorize the different potential boards that would be implemented
Board(BoardShape) - Constructor for class model.board.Board
Constructor for board depending on the shape given
BoardChess - Class in model.board
Implementation of the Board abstract class
BoardChess() - Constructor for class model.board.BoardChess
 
BoardShape - Enum in model.board
Describes the different types corresponding to a Board.
